prompt.purpose: Track pending and completed development tasks.
prompt.context: Use this list to manage work derived from the technical implementation plan.
prompt.instructions:
1. Maintain an up-to-date list of actionable tasks.
1. Record completed tasks separately.
1. Keep descriptions short and clear for efficient AI execution.
prompt.output_format: Markdown checklist under **To-Do** and **Completed Tasks** sections.
prompt.additional_notes: Update frequently to reflect current project priorities.
